column2: The Business Development operations and intelligence group provides intelligence support though the management of internal information as well as the development of technology capabilities that provide strategic advantages to the Lilly Business Development and External Innovation teams      Having precise, accurate and up-to-date information of internal Lilly business development activities is a critical basis for understanding the success of overall business development activities      Integrating this internal information with external information though intelligent technology initiatives will provide Lilly a strategic advantage over our competitors as we automate analysis      The operations and intelligence consultant will be responsible for ensuring a broad variety of internal information is accurately and precisely captured in real time      The consultant will also ensure that the internal data is appropriately integrated into multiple analysis and reporting tools, which will be developed and maintained within the team        The core of the Business Intelligence Consultant role is to be a trusted and valued business partner who has deep technical understanding and data expertise along with a strong analytical skill set      The business intelligence consultant will partner with the search evaluate, transactions, alliance management, ventures and business intelligence teams to provide expertise in right to operate activities as well as intelligence research and analysis that informs Lillybroader external innovation strategy                     Responsibilities:            Work within Business Development operations and intelligence team to broadly ensure support of right-to-operateactivities such as;          Management of internal and external SharePoint sites/libraries including the process for new site requests, creation of libraries, management of internal and external access, and ensuring compliance with internal information management requirements.      Lead projects close out activities by ensuring all documents and activities are captured with appropriate context in applicable systems. These activities will require the ability to interpret complex scientific and business information to determine appropriate metadata for future analysis activities and engagement across SE, legal, alliance management, corporate diligence, ventures and transactions teams.          Ensure accurate, precise and timely data collection and reporting for internal and external business development activities.          Engage in INOVA remediation activities to ensure data from previous business development activities contains appropriate metadata to support future analysis.      Work collaboratively within the Business Development Intelligence team to prioritize work and deliver on time-sensitive requests, including collecting and managing internal data as well as authoring internal reports for senior leadership.      Provide real-time surveillance of large pharma peers regarding deals executed and impact to Lillypriorities/business.          Manage incoming business development opportunities as appropriate by working with SE and transactions teams to determine overall interest in potential deals and manage information in appropriate systems.      Support intelligence projects by working collaboratively with business intelligence, venture science and Growth Strategy teams.Apply analytical and creative problem-solving skills to bring data from multiple sources together and contextualize for research/business meaning. Projects may include, but are not limited to, landscapes (target, disease, clinical, or technology), pipeline analyses, company profiles, and other transaction thesis.      Identify relevant and reliable sources of data/information or surrogate information sources to quickly incorporate into useful formats to inform broader transactions.      Identify and suggest alternative paths of inquiry for solving complex or challenging problems. An inquisitive mindset and a passion for investigating hard-to-find information when addressing questions with ambiguity and uncertainty is necessary.      Be able to provide and defend gathered intelligence, methodology, content, and conclusions to leadership in a clear, concise format.                Basic Qualifications/Requirements:            Advanced graduate degree/PhD in a health-related or scientific field from an accredited college or university.      5-10 years of experience in scientific or pharmaceutical intelligence roles      Excellent organizational skills: able to manage multiple projects and juggle conflicting priorities in an ambiguous environment.          Demonstrated high learning agility; able to quickly grasp new concepts and absorb large amounts of information under pressure.      Ability to simplify complex information and concepts in a clear, concise, and digestible format so the reader can quickly understand the content and conclusions of the analysis.      Advanced capabilities in Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel Power Query, and Power BI.                Additional Skills/Preferences:                MBA or equivalent experience with focus on business development activities.      Relevant scientific or intelligence experience in one or more research areas of interest for Lilly (oncology, diabetes and related complications, immunology, neurodegeneration, pain, genetic medicines, or emerging platform technologies).      Experience with artificial intelligence, machine learning, natural language processing, or designing user interfaces.                Soft Skills:            Strong work ethic, personal motivation, and team player who is dynamic and results oriented.      Ability to operate effectively in an international matrix environment, with ability to work across time zones (true global team base).      Strong desire to build and own their personal brand as they interact across a dynamic team

column1: Senior Analyst, Sustainability Rating and Reporting Programme
column2: iFORESTs Sustainability Rating and Reporting Program is focussed on promoting sustainability practices in Indian industry.      The programme aims to build a public platform to rate the sustainability performance of Indian industry.        Qualification Experience        Masters degree in Engineering, Environmental Science, Data Science, Sustainability, Finance, or a related field.      Minimum of 5 years of experience in ESG research, sustainability consulting, or a related field.a      Strong understanding of ESG issues, trends, and regulatory frameworks.      Proficient in ESG/ sustainability rating methodologies and sustainability reporting standards (e.g., GRI, SASB, TCFD).      Excellent analytical and research skills, with the ability to analyze complex data sets.      Strong communication and presentation skills, capable of conveying ESG insights to diverse audiences.      Proficient in using ESG research databases and analytical tools.      Ability to prepare technical reports      Experience of engagement with industry partners, government agencies.      Self-motivated with strong organizational and project management skills.      Desired Qualifications      CFA, CESGA, or similar certifications related to ESG or sustainability.      Experience in financial analysis or investment management with a focus on ESG integration.      Experience of working with a Credit Rating Agency will be added advantage.        Responsibilities        Research Analysis: Conduct comprehensive research and analysis on companies sustainability practices using both qualitative and quantitative methods. Evaluate companies across various sectors and geographies for their sustainability performance.      Rating Reporting: Develop and maintain sustainability ratings for companies, ensuring they reflect the latest sustainability/ ESG standards and methodologies. Prepare detailed reports and presentations to communicate sustainability ratings and insights to internal and external stakeholders.      Data Management: Collect, validate, and manage sustainability data from various sources. Ensure the accuracy and integrity of sustainability data used in analysis and reporting.      Stakeholder Engagement: Work closely with investors, companies, and other stakeholders to gather insights and feedback on sustainability issues. Participate in meetings and conferences to stay informed of the latest sustainability/ ESG trends and regulations.      Team development: Mentor junior analysts and contribute to the development of the sustainability research team.

column2: We are seeking a skilled and creative Data Visualization Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for transforming complex data sets into visually appealing and easy-to-understand graphics, dashboards, and infographics. The Data Visualization Specialist will collaborate closely with data analysts, data scientists, and business stakeholders to convey data-driven insights effectively and facilitate decision-making processes. Roles and Responsibilities: 1. Visual Storytelling: Craft engaging visual stories that transform complex data into insightful and user-friendly graphics, dashboards, and infographics. 2. Collaborative Insights: Collaborate closely with data analysts and data scientists to convey data-driven insights effectively and facilitate decision-making. 3. Aesthetics and Accuracy: Select the right visual elements, color palettes, and typography to accurately and aesthetically represent data for maximum impact. 4. Contextual Narratives: Develop compelling data narratives that provide context and meaning, making data-driven insights accessible to a wide audience. 5. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams, including data analysts, data scientists, and business stakeholders, aligning visualizations with project objectives. 6. Interactive Design: Create interactive and intuitive visuals with features like filters, tooltips, and drill-down functionality, enhancing user engagement and exploration. 7.Technical Prowess: Stay updated on the latest data visualization tools, techniques, and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions.  Skillset: 1. Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Data Science, Computer Science, Graphic Design, Information Design). 2. Knowledge of data storytelling and the ability to create engaging narratives. 3. Awareness of data visualization best practices and techniques. 4. Strong graphic design skills, including layout, typography, color theory, and composition. 5. Knowledge of Data Analysis, Data transformation, and Data preprocessing. 6. Understanding of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design principles. 7. Proficiency in Data Visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, and relevant design software.

column2: This position is located within the Analytics and Business Intelligence group, which provides Data Integration and analytics solutions to MAXIS GBN (a joint venture of MetLife and AXA). The incumbent would work as part of the cross functional team to support the administration of Salesforce platform.                                 Job Responsibilities                                           As a Salesforce Administrator, you will be responsible for managing and maintaining our Salesforce platform, ensuring its smooth operation, and supporting end-users. You will collaborate with various stakeholders to gather requirements, configure and customize Salesforce, and provide ongoing support and training.                                Serve as the primary administrator for our Salesforce platform, responsible for its configuration, customization, and maintenance.                     Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into scalable Salesforce solutions.                     Configure and customize Salesforce to meet business needs, including creating and managing custom objects, fields, workflows, validation rules, and process builder flows.                     Create and maintain user roles, profiles, permission sets, and sharing rules to ensure appropriate data access and security.                     Manage data imports, exports, and data quality, including data cleansing and deduplication activities.                     Monitor and maintain data integrity by performing regular data audits and cleanup tasks.                     Collaborate with developers and integration teams to ensure smooth integration of Salesforce with other systems and applications.                     Provide end-user support and training, including creating documentation, conducting training sessions, and addressing user inquiries and issues.                     Stay up-to-date with Salesforce releases, features, and best practices, and proactively recommend enhancements and improvements to optimize system performance and user experience.                     Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues, and work with Salesforce support as needed to resolve technical problems.                     Participate in system upgrades, testing, and deployment activities, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations.                                                     Knowledge, Skills and Abilities                                       Education                         Bachelor s degree or diploma, with a minimum of 15 years of education. Master s degree (M.Sc., M.Tech., or MBA) in the relevant field.                                     Experience                         Relevant experience of at least 4 years                                     Knowledge and skills        (general and technical)                     Proven experience as a Salesforce Administrator, with a strong understanding of Salesforce platform capabilities and limitations.                     Salesforce Administrator certification (such as Salesforce Certified Administrator) is preferred.                     Proficiency in Salesforce configuration, including creating custom objects, fields, workflows, and validation rules.                     Familiarity with Salesforce security models, user management, and data access controls.                     Experience in data management, including data imports, exports, and data quality control.                     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with an attention to detail.                     Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.                     Ability to collaborate and work effectively in a team environment.                     Self-motivated and proactive with the ability to manage multiple priorities and meet deadlines.                     Experience with Salesforce Lightning is a plus.                     Knowledge of Salesforce integrations and third-party applications is desirable.

column2: Aurora s Research department is seeking a results-oriented Analyst or Senior Analyst to join our subscription energy analytics and client-facing services for the Indian power sector, based in our Gurugram office.          This position suits candidates with experience working in the energy or financial sectors, who possess some experience in power market analysis in India or another country.                  This position will offer a chance to engage with leading stakeholders in the Indian power market and help to drive forward Aurora s best-in-class modelling.          Your role will be to help analyse and forecast the Indian power market, supported by our proprietary energy market models and analytics software.      You will work on policy analysis and investment economics for renewables and other technologies and engage with a client base that includes leading Indian and international energy, financial and governmental organisations.          Your role will benefit from tutoring by experienced team members in Gurugram and Oxford, and allow you to grow into a market expert, delivering market-leading analysis to top clients, and contributing learning to Aurora s wider global research team.        Key Responsibilities        Contribute analysis and research to develop Aurora s view on renewable and conventional assets.      Analyse and understand policy outcomes across India s energy sector.      Work with Aurora s best-in-class modelling to develop our views on the future of the Indian energy system.      Communicate findings to a wide range of clients, in-person and online.      Contribute materials to Aurora s reports, notes and client communications.                Required attributes:          We will consider candidates who have between 1 - 3 years of experience at a major consultancy, energy company, financial services company, or other knowledge-focused firm or institution.      Relevant degree in Economics, Engineering, or other relevant quantitative discipline from a top university.      Proven ability to organise and manage their own time.      Proven ability to interpret and derive insight from complex quantitative data and information.      Ability to communicate clearly and cooperate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.      Self-starting, entrepreneurial mindset, and desire to grow the business.          Desirable attributes:          Experience in conducting analysis on power markets, in India or another context.      Experience working on financial markets or project finance.      Demonstrated success in working together with clients.      Competence in advanced data analytics (e.g. Python, R, Matlab, Advanced Excel).

column2: Consultants combine best-in-class analytic skills with strong problem-solving and communication abilities to help clients solve strategic and tactical business problems. Consultants are skilled at all aspects of project execution with the ability to prepare client-ready materials with limited oversight / guidance from project managers. They are expected to independently manage specific tasks / workstreams within projects and mentor junior team members. Consultants may work on multiple projects simultaneously and lead a small team in each one of them.             Position Responsibilities               Ensures development of a successful project / workstream plan after high level direction from the senior project lead with a clear understanding of project objectives         Takes ownership of methodology instrument design for market research projects to address key objectives based on high level guidance provided by senior project team member.          Translates understanding of brand strategy and client needs & beliefs into likely hypotheses, and ensures analytical approach is effective in testing hypotheses to find most relevant insights.          Anticipates potential challenges in analysis and proactively works with team to figure out a mitigation strategy.          Demonstrates creative flexibility and innovation to modify design approach as necessary with more abstract client feedback or changing business project objectives.          Is able to use the prior experience to apply advanced statistical knowledge (CHAID, Choice modeling, Clustering, kNN, Regression etc.) to solve a business problem.         Ensures that team members are able to execute the analysis with right analytical approach and proper quality check guidelines.         Proactively creates good processes and automation set ups to increase the efficiency and quality of the deliverables          Responsible for quality of entire team and all materials; double-checks all project materials and analysis provided from other team members.          Maintains focus on strategic implications of analytical insights, and effectively guides junior team member(s) to achieve necessary depth and breadth of insights.         Ensure client needs and preferences are incorporated into slide development; customizes report to audience and format of presentation when developing deliverables.          Guides development of new slide frameworks and visual templates that can present key data / insights powerfully.         Sends timely and thoughtful responses to client/leadership requests, questions, and needs.         Presents project findings & recommendations to clients in a compelling and engaging way (when appropriate based on client presentation preferences)          Responsible for professional development, engagement and coaching of junior team members.          Teaches best practices to junior team members for structured written and verbal communication.          Demonstrates a desire and willingness to learn and learns for all interactions and team members on a project/team Adapts working style as needed, developing strong collaboration and trust across team members.         Demonstrates good judgement across all interactions, and a respect for all team members internally and externally.              Position Requirements               Education     :         A bachelor s or master s degree in a quantitative, analytical discipline, such as Operations Research, Applied Mathematics, Economics, Management Science, Data Science, Statistics, or Engineering will be preferred.              Consultants    Minimum 3 years of experience in Market Research and marketing consulting work. Knowledge of US healthcare market will be a plus.          Experience in execution of advanced analytical methods CHAID, Hypothesis Testing, A/B testing, CART, Regression, Clustering, Factor Analysis, MNL, Choice Modeling, kNN, K-means, Predictive analysis, Generalized Linear Models etc.          Knowledge of tools/programming platforms Sawtooth, R, SAS, SPSS, Advanced Excel, Advanced Powerpoint          Experience in writing surveys and discussion guides with knowledge of biases and ways to make instruments easier for respondents.          Evidence of leading and managing teams/projects          Evidence of strong oral and written communication          Evidence of working in a fast-paced versatile environment         Comfort and flexibility with ambiguity          Strong attention to detail with a quality focused mindset          Evidence for high motivation and good professional attitude/work ethic.            A bachelor s or master s degree in a quantitative, analytical discipline, such as Operations Research, Applied Mathematics, Economics, Management Science, Data Science, Statistics, or Engineering will be preferred.

column2: As a BI Consultant/ BI Asst Manager, you will serve as a trusted advisor to our clients, leveraging your expertise in data analytics and business intelligence to drive strategic decision-making      You will work closely with our clients and executives to understand their unique business challenges, design tailored solutions, and deliver actionable insights that drive measurable results      The ideal candidate will possess a strong blend of technical proficiency, strategic thinking, and client-facing skills          Responsibilities:        * Client Engagement and Support Management: Partner with clients to    understand their business objectives, challenges, and requirements related to    business intelligence and analytics. Address the client requests/concerns and    provide support on their data and analytics needs.    * Solution Design: Collaborate with clients, SME and engineers to gather    requirements, analyze business processes, and design end-to-end BI solutions   that address their specific needs and objectives.    * Data Analysis, Modeling, and Integration: Conduct comprehensive analysis of client data to identify trends, patterns, and insights that inform strategic    recommendations and decision-making. Develop and implement data models, ETL processes, and data integration to transform raw data into meaningful insights, leveraging tools such as MSSQL, Python, or ETL platforms.    * Dashboard and Report Development: Design and build interactive dashboards, reports, and data visualizations using BI tools such as Sisense (primary), Power BI or similar platforms to facilitate data exploration and    decision-making.    * Stakeholder Management: Collaborate closely with key stakeholders,    including executives, business users, and engineering team to ensure alignment and successful implementation of BI solutions.    * Consulting and Advisory: Serve as a trusted advisor to clients, providing    expert guidance on BI best practices, data governance, and analytics strategies to maximize the value of BI investments and organic growth.    * Technical Leadership: Lead and mentor junior developers, providing    technical guidance, code reviews, and knowledge sharing to foster a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.    * Project Management: Manage BI projects from inception to completion,    including scoping, planning, client engagement, solution designing and    delivery, ensuring alignment with client expectations and project goals.    * Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities to enhance    existing processes, tools, and methodologies to optimize efficiency and    effectiveness.    * Knowledge Sharing: Share expertise and best practices with clients and    internal teams through training sessions, workshops, and documentation to    foster learning and enablement.        Qualification:        * Proven experience (6+ years) in business intelligence development and    consulting, driving strategic decision-making, organic growth preferably within a product company or consulting firm.    * Strong proficiency in BI tools such as Sisense (primary), Power BI,    Tableau, or similar platforms, as well as SQL for data querying and    manipulation.    * Strong proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, Power Query,    MSSQL, and python (good to have).    * Experience with data warehousing concepts, data modeling, and ETL    processes; knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure is good to have.    * Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to    translate complex business requirements into technical solutions, actionable    insights, and recommendations.    * Strong communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to    effectively interact with clients, stakeholders, and team members at all levels   and experience in organic growth (good to have).    * Proven track record of successfully delivering BI projects on time,    addressing client concerns/queries, root cause analysis and meeting, or    exceeding client expectations.    * Certification in relevant BI technologies or methodologies (eg, Microsoft    Certified: Data Analyst Associate, Tableau Desktop Specialist) is a plus.
column11: Data analysis, Data modeling, Project management, Analytical, Consulting, Business intelligence, microsoft, Stakeholder management, SQL, Python

column2: - Proven expertise in configuring and managing HubSpot CRM.   - Strong grasp of the SaaS business model and industry dynamics.   - Experience in database management and segmentation for targeted marketing.   - Proficiency in creating and managing HubSpot reports and dashboards.   - Skillful in integrating HubSpot with other tools like Salesforce and Zapier.   - Knowledgeable about data privacy and security standards relevant to CRM systems.   - Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues within HubSpot.   - Experience in training and supporting staff on HubSpot functionalities.   - Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.   - Strong communication and project management abilities.       Desired Skills:     - Certification in HubSpot Administration.   - Experience with advanced HubSpot features such as workflows and custom objects.   - Background in implementing AI and machine learning within CRM systems.   - Proficiency in additional CRM platforms to enhance interoperability.   - Experience in lead scoring models and marketing automation.   - Familiarity with SQL or other database querying languages.   - Advanced data analysis skills with tools like Tableau or Google Analytics.   - Experience in managing cross-functional projects involving multiple stakeholders.   - Strong interpersonal skills with a focus on teamwork and collaboration.   - Innovative thinking with a track record of process improvement initiatives.       Key Responsibilities:     - Oversee the daily management and optimization of our HubSpot CRM platform.   - Design and implement effective CRM strategies to support business objectives.   - Develop and maintain comprehensive reporting systems to track key business metrics.   - Collaborate with marketing, sales, and customer service teams to ensure CRM alignment with business needs.   - Conduct regular system audits to ensure data accuracy and integrity.   - Provide training and support to team members on HubSpot functionalities.   - Lead the integration of HubSpot with other software tools and systems.   - Manage user roles and permissions within HubSpot to ensure data security.   - Stay updated on new HubSpot features and best practices, implementing these into our operations.   - Lead and participate in projects to enhance CRM capabilities and improve user experience.       Key Result Areas:     - System Uptime and Reliability: Maintain near-perfect uptime for the CRM system.   - Turnaround Time (TAT): Ensure quick response and resolution times for CRM issues and requests.   - Customer Satisfaction (C-SAT): Achieve high satisfaction ratings from internal users for CRM usability and support.   - Data Accuracy: Maintain high standards of data quality and accuracy in CRM reporting.   - User Adoption Rates: Increase the number of active users engaging with the CRM system.   - Process Efficiency: Streamline CRM processes to reduce manual input and increase automation.   - Innovation and Improvement: Implement new features and processes that contribute to business growth.   - Training Completion: Ensure comprehensive training programs are completed and well-received.   - Project Completion: Successfully complete CRM-related projects on time and within budget.

column2: A typical day as a Sr Data Analytics Consultant may include the following:                         You will build ETL processes to extract data from multiple sources and model data for analytical needs.             You will transform data through applying business rules, auditing and staging data to support system migrations.              You will use problem solving and creativity to design and build data flows and mapping processes that are accurate and efficient.             You will provide documentation of processes built and report progress to the project lead in a timely manner. column1: Senior Analyst, Sustainability Rating and Reporting Programme
column2: iFORESTs Sustainability Rating and Reporting Program is focussed on promoting sustainability practices in Indian industry.      The programme aims to build a public platform to rate the sustainability performance of Indian industry.        Qualification Experience        Masters degree in Engineering, Environmental Science, Data Science, Sustainability, Finance, or a related field.      Minimum of 5 years of experience in ESG research, sustainability consulting, or a related field.a      Strong understanding of ESG issues, trends, and regulatory frameworks.      Proficient in ESG/ sustainability rating methodologies and sustainability reporting standards (e.g., GRI, SASB, TCFD).      Excellent analytical and research skills, with the ability to analyze complex data sets.      Strong communication and presentation skills, capable of conveying ESG insights to diverse audiences.      Proficient in using ESG research databases and analytical tools.      Ability to prepare technical reports      Experience of engagement with industry partners, government agencies.      Self-motivated with strong organizational and project management skills.      Desired Qualifications      CFA, CESGA, or similar certifications related to ESG or sustainability.      Experience in financial analysis or investment management with a focus on ESG integration.      Experience of working with a Credit Rating Agency will be added advantage.        Responsibilities        Research Analysis: Conduct comprehensive research and analysis on companies sustainability practices using both qualitative and quantitative methods. Evaluate companies across various sectors and geographies for their sustainability performance.      Rating Reporting: Develop and maintain sustainability ratings for companies, ensuring they reflect the latest sustainability/ ESG standards and methodologies. Prepare detailed reports and presentations to communicate sustainability ratings and insights to internal and external stakeholders.      Data Management: Collect, validate, and manage sustainability data from various sources. Ensure the accuracy and integrity of sustainability data used in analysis and reporting.      Stakeholder Engagement: Work closely with investors, companies, and other stakeholders to gather insights and feedback on sustainability issues. Participate in meetings and conferences to stay informed of the latest sustainability/ ESG trends and regulations.      Team development: Mentor junior analysts and contribute to the development of the sustainability research team.

column2: Responsible for supporting the delivery of integrated processes, data and systems using sound technical capabilities to ensure the integrity and effectiveness of data management control and undertaking a range of master data management activities to support implementation of new data management processes, while ensuring adherence to policies and procedures to meet BPs requirements.        KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES                 Data quality framework: Demonstrate deep understanding of data quality value chain, encompassing Critical Data Element concepts, data quality issue management, DQ KPIs/Measures and DQ remediation. Perform Data Quality Issue assessments to aid improvements in operational process and BAU initiatives     Data Profiling: Work with business (Data Owners/Data Stewards) to profile data to uncover patterns indicating data quality issues and converts them into rules for ongoing monitoring     Business analysis and data quality rules definition: Elicit business requirement through discussions with data owners, business SMEs, program team to document business DQ rules supporting KPIs/Measures for BAU monitoring.     Design thinking and modelling: Leverage knowledge of SAP data structures to perform data and impact analysis for assigned use-cases by accessing Azure data lake (via dataBricks) using SQL/Python. Define model (conceptual) and functional design to support automated DQ monitoring. Chair workshops with data governance analysts, developers and data integration team to work through various options and come up with optimal design. Participate in testing of solutions and ensure they are fit for purpose for business use.     Visualization and dashboarding: Support design, build and deployment of high quality, actionable reports and dashboards (leveraging Power BI) which detect poor data quality and help business drive resolution. Determines escalation paths and constructs workflow and alerts which notify process and data owners of unresolved data exceptions requiring actions. Collaborates with IT & analytics teams to drive innovation by leveraging AI, ML, NLP etc.     Root cause analysis and impact assessment: Come up with models to calculate financial impacts of Data Quality Issue. Further identify business benefit (quantitative/qualitative) from a remediation standpoint while managing implementation timelines. Participate in data governance forums to present data quality finding and recommend plan of action for resolution.     Data quality issue management and remediation: Work alongside the data governance and data remediation team to uncover DQ issue based on exceptions and come up with approach while parallelly driving business accountability and ownership      Project Management: Own and drive data quality projects against the plan and ensure risks/issues are identified and escalated well in time.     Collaboration and Communication: Build a rapport with business stakeholders, technology team, program team and wider digital solution and transformation team to suggest areas to make a difference through the implementation of data governance framework.             Essential Experience and Job Requirements:         11+ total years of experience predominantly in Oil & Gas or Financial Services/Banking industry within Data Management space     Experience of working with Data Models/Structures and comfortable in deep-diving to design and fine tune them     Experience of Data Quality Management i.e. Governance, data quality management (root cause analysis, Remediation /solution identification), Governance Forums (papers production, quorum maintenance, Minutes publication), CDE identification, Data Lineage (identification of authoritative data sources) preferred. Understanding of KPIs/Measures needed as well     Experience of having worked with senior stakeholders in multiple Data Domain/Business Areas, CDO and Technology. Ability to operate in global teams within multiple time zones     Ability to operate in a dynamic and changing setup and be able to identify priorities. Comfortable to operate independently without too much direction.             Desirable criteria         SAP MDG/SAP ECC/CFIN experience (T codes, Tables structures etc.)     Azure Data lake /AWS/Data Bricks     Creating dashboards & workflows (powerBI Qlikview or Tableau etc.)     Creating analytics and insight in a DQ setting (powerBI/powerQuery)     Profiling and analysis skills (, Informatica or Collibra)     Persuading, influencing and communication at a senior level management level     Certification in Data Management, Data Science, Python/R desirable                   Skills:     Accounting for financial instruments, Accounting for financial instruments, Accounting policy, Accounting processes and financial systems, Agility core practices, Agility tools, Analytical Thinking, Analytics, Business process control, Business process improvement, Collaboration, Commercial acumen, Commercial assurance for external reporting, Communication, Creativity and Innovation, Credit Management, Curiosity, Customer centric thinking, Data Analysis, Data visualization and interpretation, Decision Making, Digital Automation, Digital fluency, Financial accounting and reporting, Influencing {+ 5 more}

column2: The CSG BI organization is responsible for insights and recommendations to optimize the user experiences of IT applications. Effective outputs require a simple user-friendly synthesis of information, including actionable insights, analytical solutions, and AI-powe'red products.          The team needs individuals with extensive business and analytical knowledge to deliver high value, actionable insights and recommendations. We are looking for a candidate who has a solid background in analytics, demonstrates proven abilities to be innovative and creative, and is an effective collaborator and communicator enabling influence.          The candidate will have excellent analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques, project management skills, and product mindset.          He/she will have the experience of working on solving complex analytical problems and should be comfortable with analytical tools.         The person will be responsible for operating within a dynamic, fast-paced, scalable & agile IT development environment, which faces both internal and external customers. Role Requirements:               Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to convey analytic insights effectively to both IT and business leaders;             Data Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or Business Degree, or equivalent professional experience;             6+ years of relevant work experience or 4+ years of work experience with a master degree;              4+ years of experience with data analytics, business analytics, or data science;             Hands-on analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques and frameworks, and the ability to deal with large volumes of data;             Experience with Python/R and SQL;             Experience with data visualization tools, such as Power BI, Tableau, or Looker;             Knowledge of machine learning algorithms/concepts;             Proficiency in statistics and research methods;             Self-motivated with excellent capability of dealing with ambiguity;             Demonstrated knowledge of project management, leadership/teamwork, and stakeholder/customer management skills, and business acumen;             Comfortable with data cleaning processes to ensure data integrity;             Eager to learn new skills and knowledge and apply new skills and concepts quickly;                   Preferences:                MBA, Engineering or CS Degree from top schools;             Experience with web analytics tools, such as Adobe SiteCatalyst/Data Workbench, Google Analytics or Coveo;           Understanding of AI Machine Learning (ML            Understanding of Tech Support and/or Order Support processes is a plus;             Understanding of data warehousing and ETL is a plus;             Experience with product management is a plus;             Experience in working with global teams;             Candidates may come from different strategy consulting backgrounds- Management Consulting, Digital strategy or eCommerce strategy.

column2: Job Description Title:Sales Ex COE - Client Success Data Science Associate Manager Role (Job Profile):Analytics and Modeling Associate Manager Management Level:Associate Manager (ML8)  You are: An experienced data scientist with a flair for turning data into business insights. You enjoy searching for patterns and connections in data to discover trends, root causes and solutions. While logical and objective in your approach, your true superpower is helping others to see how things can be done differently. You use AI modeling to test theories and identify ways to improve processes. The work: The Center of Excellence (COE) enables Sales Excellence to deliver best-in-class service offerings to Accenture leaders, practitioners, and sales teams. As a member of the COE Analytics Modeling Analysis team, you will generate business insights to help Accenture to improve its processes, boost sales and maximize profitability. You will build models and scorecards that help business leaders to understand trends and market drivers. You will work closely with operations teams to turn these insights into user-friendly solutions. Managing access to tools and monitoring their usage.

column2: The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song Practice | Marketing Transformation | Martech Platform  Consultant ( Marketing and Customer  Analytics) Join our team of  Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song  who solve customer facing challenges at clients spanning sales,  service  and marketing to accelerate business change. Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture Strategy & Consulting's Customer, Sales & Service practice. column2: Skill required:Catastrophe Underwriting - Catastrophe Underwriting Research  Designation:Management Level - Team Lead/Consultant  Job Location:Bengaluru  Qualifications:BE  Years of Experience:7 to 11 years  What would you do? You will be aligned to our Financial Services, banking, Insurance, and Capital Market vertical which is focused on helping clients with their tax preparations, insurance coverage, and investment portfolios. This team is responsible for providing insurance account data entry, enhancement, coding, and modeling support to underwriting and regional catastrophe teams globally. They help in processing submission data files within stipulated time frames by entering them into account modeling systems, translating, coding to model recognizable format(s), assessing, correcting location addresses and geocoding using Google. The team helps in modeling one or more different policy structures per account, and multiple options as requested by the underwriter. Modeling accounts to estimate catastrophe losses from all perils using multiple catastrophe models and provide catastrophe modeling results to support the pricing and underwriting process. You will be working as a part of a dynamic research and development team comprising people with diverse backgrounds, such as natural hazards, atmospheric sciences, engineering, flood modeling, etc. This position will be responsible for conducting research and developing cutting-edge underwriting and portfolio management solutions for risk assessment from atmosphere/weather-related perils - tropical and extra-tropical cyclones, tornado/hail, winter storms, and wildfire, etc. You will be working on catastrophe risk models to perform in-depth validation of hazard and vulnerability components of tropical/extra-tropical cyclones, tornado/hail, winter storms, wildfire catastrophe models from RMS and AIR. You would be responsible for developing, tuning, and updating internal natural hazard-related datasets/models and risk management tools and interact with internal and exter  What are we looking for? .NET Programming  Catastrophe Underwriting Research  Microsoft SQL Server  Detail orientation  Problem-solving skills  Strong analytical skills  Written and verbal communication  Property and Casualty Insurance  Python (Programming Language) Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of moderately complex problems  May create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures  The person would require understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals  Primary upward interaction is with direct supervisor  May interact with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture  Guidance would be provided when determining methods and procedures on new assignments  Decisions made by you will often impact the team in which they reside  Individual would manage small teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

The Project Delivery Excellence team focuses on developing and implementing a strong foundation of processes, systems, measurements, and controls that can help deliver high performance consistently. column2: Skill required:Reporting & Insights - Reporting Analytics  Designation:Analytics and Modeling Analyst  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years Language - Ability:Japanese - Expert  What would you do? The Global People Analytics (GPA) team is made up of over 300 analytics, reporting, solution architecture, product owner, development, data science, and change management/training professionals around the world whose mission is to provide Accenture business and HR leaders with strategic and operational analytics and insights to enable data-led decision making. Proficiency in Japanese language and English is mandatory. The role involves but not limited to the following  Understand business requirements and translate into meaningful data analysis  Link the data findings to developments and known issues in the entity organization, and thus provide a preliminary interpretation/translation of data  Support global & entity programs/initiatives with creation of reports and scorecards, working with lead and system owners to determine data that should be used and how to report it  Leverage team members across HR TA&I to present a consolidated big picture to customers  Individual contributor and/or oversees a small work effort and/or team  Work with minimal supervision on daily tasks and moderate level of instruction on new assignments In Reporting and Analytics, you will have to prepare management reports and analysis, both recurring and ad-hoc. column2: Senior Adobe Target Developer   Experience - 2 - 4 yrs Role:  The Senior Adobe Target Developer is tasked with deploying, managing, and optimizing Adobe Target to enhance all product brand experiences across the organization. This role requires a high level of technical expertise in Adobe Target, Adobe Launch and Adobe Analytics, along with experience in crafting personalized, data-driven campaigns and solutions. Responsibilities:   Strategy: Craft a vision for personalization and testing strategies that align with organizational goals and maximize the potential of Adobe Target. Evaluate current digital marketing strategies and identify opportunities for enhancement through Adobe Targets capabilities. Work alongside the marketing team to integrate personalization strategies into broader campaigns, ensuring a consistent and engaging brand message. Operational: Build and manage a robust Adobe Target environment, ensuring stability, scalability, and responsiveness to the evolving needs of the business. Create and oversee the creation and implementation of detailed personalization and optimization plans across various digital assets. Ensure seamless integration of Adobe Target with other systems, such as CMS, CRM, and eCommerce platforms, for a unified marketing approach. Execute complex Adobe Target activities, including audience segmentation, targeting, and trigger-based personalization tactics. Problem Solving:   Conduct detailed analyses of campaign performances, using Adobe Targets testing results to inform and refine marketing strategies. Regularly audit and optimize Adobe Target implementations for enhanced performance and better user experiences. Create and maintain a knowledge base of best practices and lessons learned from past campaigns and technical challenges. Communication: Serve as the technical Adobe Target expert within cross-functional teams, offering guidance and insight into the capabilities and advantages of the platform. Translate technical concepts and campaign results into actionable insights for marketing teams and senior management. Lead training sessions for the marketing and development teams on Adobe Target features, updates, and best practices. Desired Experience: Minimum of 4 years of experience with a strong emphasis on Adobe Target development in a high-traffic, enterprise-level environment. Demonstrated expertise in successfully deploying Adobe Target to power complex product brand experiences, having worked with diverse teams and stakeholders. Proven ability in configuring, administering, and operating Adobe Target to create and execute multi-channel campaigns, including web, email, and mobile. Comprehensive experience in debugging, troubleshooting, and resolving Adobe Target configuration and integration issues in real-time, minimizing disruption to live environments. Experience partnering with analytics teams to align Adobe Target data with broader analytics initiatives, ensuring consistency and accuracy in measurement across customized site experiences. Proven track record of diagnosing and troubleshooting technical issues related to custom site experiences and achieving resolution that aligns with business objectives. Familiarity with conducting rigorous A/B and multivariate testing, understanding the nuances of testing methodologies, and interpreting results to guide marketing decisions. A history of working closely with design and UX teams to implement personalized user experiences based on data-driven insights. Involvement in the full project lifecycle, from conception through to development, deployment, and post-launch optimization and analysis. Prior experience in mentoring junior developers and leading by example in both technical expertise and project management. Demonstrated ability to write clear, maintainable code and documentation for Adobe Target implementations and to communicate complex technical issues to non-technical stakeholders. Desired Qualifications: Advanced degree in a relevant field such as Computer Science, Marketing, or Data Analytics. Certification in Adobe Target, Adobe Launch, and Adobe Analytics, with a deep understanding of the technical and strategic aspects of both tools. Extensive knowledge of web analytics, data analysis, and the interplay between data-driven decision-making and user experience design. Technical proficiency in database technology, including SQL-based databases like Redshift and Snowflake, and advanced reporting tools such as Power BI, Tableau, SAS, Cision, Nielsen. Skilled in programming languages like Python, JavaScript, R, and SQL to support complex implementations and integrations.  Lead Developer   Experience - 4 - 6yrs Role:  The Adobe Target and Adobe Analytics Lead Developer is a technical expert role responsible for leading the development and implementation of Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target solutions. This role involves deep technical knowledge and the ability to architect, design, and customize Adobe solutions to fit business needs and objectives. The Lead Developer will ensure the robust and scalable deployment of Adobe's marketing tools to enhance data-driven decision-making and personalized user experiences. Responsibilities:   Strategy: Define the strategic direction for the development and integration of Adobe Target and Adobe Analytics within the organizations technical stack and marketing initiatives. Collaborate with the digital marketing and IT teams to enhance online consumer experiences through targeted content and data analytics. Spearhead the strategic employment of Adobe Target for content optimization, aligning with user behavior insights derived from Adobe Analytics. Devise and refine analytics-driven strategies to personalize user experience and improve key performance indicators. Operational: Lead the end-to-end development and implementation process for Adobe Target and Analytics initiatives, ensuring a seamless project lifecycle from conception to execution. Execute high-quality A/B testing, leveraging Adobe Target and Analytics to inform and validate content optimization strategies. Utilize deep expertise in database technologies (like Redshift and Snowflake) to structure data analysis that complements Adobe Target and Analytics initiatives. Apply advanced reporting tools (such as Power BI, Tableau, SAS, Cision, Nielsen) to visualize test results and inform business decisions. Develop custom scripts and leverage programming languages (Python, JavaScript, R, SQL) to extend the functionality of Adobe Target and Analytics. Drive the technical aspects of Adobe Launch implementations to streamline tag management and data collection processes. Problem Solving:   Diagnose and resolve complex issues within Adobe Target and Adobe Analytics environments, providing scalable and efficient solutions. Continuously assess and mitigate risks associated with the technical aspects of Adobe Target and Analytics integrations and customizations. Use advanced data analysis techniques to interpret complex test results, transforming them into meaningful business insights and actions. Tackle technical challenges associated with Adobe Target and Analytics integration, providing robust solutions to maintain operational excellence . Communication: Liaise between cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and technical staff to ensure clear communication of project objectives, timelines, and status. Create and maintain documentation for Adobe Target and Analytics implementations, sharing knowledge across teams and stakeholders. Desired Experience: A minimum of 5+ years of professional experience in a development role with a strong focus on Adobe Experience Cloud, particularly Adobe Target and Adobe Analytics. Proven track record of developing solutions within the Adobe Experience Cloud ecosystem, with hands-on expertise in tools such as Adobe Launch for effective tag management. Use advanced data analysis techniques to interpret complex test results, transforming them into meaningful business insights and actions. Tackle technical challenges associated with Adobe Target, Adobe Launch, and Analytics integration, providing robust solutions to maintain operational excellence. Desired Qualifications: Expertise in Adobe Experience Cloud products, specifically Adobe Target, Analytics, and Launch. Proficiency in database technology such as Redshift and Snowflake. Proficiency in reporting and analytics tools like Power BI, Tableau, SAS, Cision, and Nielsen. Strong programming skills, including proficiency in Python, JavaScript, R, and SQL. Scrum Master/Engagement Manager: Experience: 8 - 10 yrs   Role:  The Scrum Master/Engagement Manager is a key enabler of project execution, dedicated to guiding the team in Agile practices and elevating team efficiency.  As an integral part of the organization, this role is central to fostering the incorporation and optimal use of Adobe solutions within the ambit of our projects.  The incumbent will serve as a vital link in managing communications with stakeholders, ensuring a seamless flow of information, and adherence to project timelines and budgets.  This role is instrumental in amplifying the benefits derived from Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target tools, spearheading innovative practices, and upholding operational excellence in accordance with Agile principles. Responsibilities:   Strategy: Lead the strategic integration of Adobe solutions (Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target) within project plans, ensuring they align with agile practices and contribute to the organizations goals. Establish best practices for the use of Adobe products (Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target) in project management and execution. Operational: Oversee the project delivery process, including project planning, resource allocation, risk management, and budgeting. Ensure timely completion of projects by managing schedules, resources, and stakeholders. Problem Solving:   Manage and escalate project risks and issues to appropriate stakeholders and work on their timely resolution. Conduct regular risk assessments and implement mitigation strategies. Communication: Serve as the primary liaison for projects involving Adobe solutions, communicating with stakeholders on progress, risks, and timelines. Develop and maintain strong, collaborative relationships with all stakeholders, particularly those involved in Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target usage. Desired Experience: A minimum of 8 years of experience in project management, with at least 3 years focused on managing and implementing Adobe software solutions and applications. Demonstrated experience in an agile environment, preferably with a background in Adobe-related projects (Adobe Analytics and Adobe Target) or digital transformation initiatives. Desired Qualifications: MBA from a premier institute (such as IIMs/ISB/ XLRI/FMS/SP Jain). Certifications relevant to Adobe products, such as Adobe Certified Expert (ACE) or Adobe Certified Master, with a focus on Adobe Analytics, Adobe Target, Adobe Experience Manager, or other key Adobe suite applications. Deep understanding of the Adobe Experience Cloud, particularly Adobe Analytics, Adobe Experience Platform, and other key Adobe digital marketing tools. Experience in implementing, customizing, and optimizing Adobe solutions to drive business outcomes. Familiarity with database technologies, data modeling, and SQL, particularly as they relate to data integration with Adobe platforms. Strong understanding of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and their use in tracking and optimizing customer experiences. Proven track record in leading cross-functional teams in a collaborative and inclusive manner. Ability to translate complex Adobe solution capabilities into business benefits for stakeholders. Experience in training and mentoring team members on Adobe product features and best practices. Knowledge of digital marketing principles and how Adobe solutions can enhance digital marketing strategies. Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to provide practical solutions aligned with the core business objectives. S oactive and continuous learner, staying ahead of industry trends and advancements in Adobe products and agile methodologies.S

column2: At our Sanofi we are leveraging analytics and technology, on behalf of patients around the world. We are seeking those who have a passion for using data, analytics, and insights to drive decision making that will allow us to tackle some of the world s greatest health threats.          Within our commercial Insights, Analytics, and Data organization we are transforming to better power decision-making across our end-to-end commercialization process, from business development to late lifecycle management.          Forecasting and analytics deliverables support planning and decision making across multiple functional areas such as finance, manufacturing, product development and commercial.          In addition to ensuring high-quality deliverables, our team drives synergies across the franchise, fosters innovation and best practices, and creates solutions to bring speed, scale and shareability to our planning processes. As we endeavour, we are seeking a dynamic talent for the role of    Senior Analyst - Forecasting Analytics            It is essential to have someone who understands and aspires to implement innovative analytics techniques to drive our insights generation across different functions.            People:          Maintain effective relationship with the stakeholders (Country Cross border Teams) within or cross GBUs and tasks - with an end objective to develop educational and communication content as per requirement.      Actively lead and develop SGH operations associates and ensure innovative technologies are leveraged.      Initiate the contracting process and related documents within defined timelines; and      Collaborate with global stakeholders for project planning and setting up the timelines and maintaining budget.          Performance:          Support forecasting activities (pre and post forecasting), including updating TM1 PAFE (excel based) models, testing data push to TM1.      Creating complex TM1 Planning analytics reports - Quick, Dynamic, and customized. Test and validate report working in TM1 web.      Largely working on creating/updating TM1/Planning analytics views, using MDX to create subsets for views, working with Production support to create ad hoc Turbo integrator processes, Writing business rules.      Define and evaluate reporting and analytics needs at the individual country level or market level while enhancing solutions.      Design TM1 dimensions, attributes, aliases, cubes for new markets/products additions and ready to launch products thus evolving the existing TM1 application.      Oversee monthly actuals load process, validate the data.      Work with production team to deploy solutions.      Integrate new data sources with TM1.      Streamline and optimize forecasting collection and submission process.     Refresh Existing Reports and identifies improvement opportunities in reporting and BI tools and as needed structure / functionality with the latest insights as they become available.      Collaborate with Digital teams to enhance data access across various sources, develop tools, technology, and process to constantly improve quality and productivity.      Create robust forecast models and dashboards taking into consideration key data, insights, trends, and assumptions around patient flow, market dynamics, competitive landscape, payer mix, supply chain inventory fluctuation, etc.      Evaluate and maintain existing forecast models; identify and prioritize areas for improvement to iteratively improve function over time.      Refresh forecast model assumptions and as needed structure / functionality with the latest insights as they become available.         Process:          Identify and interpret business needs, analyse, and prioritize the requirements, write functional specifications, design, and analyse data, identify gaps, and provide business requirements and expectations feedback. TCFD, SASB, etc)         Your role and responsibilities:         Sustainability Process reporting and optimization: Implement audit-ready Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD) reporting reporting processes to match evolution of ESG reporting standards     Enablement and Guidance for Content Owners: ensuring their readiness for disclosure requirements, closing identified gaps, and column2: The CSG BI organization is responsible for insights and recommendations to optimize the user experiences of IT applications.              This includes analyses focused on application speed, stability, adoption, and user behaviors. Such work includes data ingestion, data munging, statistical analysis, data modelling, model evaluation, and model deployment. Effective outputs require a simple user-friendly synthesis of information, including actionable insights, analytical solutions, and AI-powered products.              The team needs individuals with extensive business and analytical knowledge to deliver high value, actionable insights and recommendations. We are looking for a candidate who has a solid background in analytics, demonstrates proven abilities to be innovative and creative, and is an effective collaborator and communicator enabling influence.              The candidate will have excellent analytics capabilities, expertise in analytical problem-solving techniques, project management skills, and product mindset.              He/she will have the experience of working on solving complex analytical problems and should be comfortable with analytical tools. The person will be responsible for operating within a dynamic, fast-paced, scalable & agile IT development environment, which faces both internal and external customers. column2: At our Sanofi we are leveraging analytics and technology, on behalf of patients around the world. We are seeking those who have a passion for using data, analytics, and insights to drive decision making that will allow us to tackle some of the world s greatest health threats.          Within our commercial Insights, Analytics, and Data organization we are transforming to better power decision-making across our end-to-end commercialization process, from business development to late lifecycle management.         Analytics and/or forecasting deliverables support planning and decision making across multiple functional areas such as finance, manufacturing, product development and commercial.          In addition to ensuring high-quality deliverables, our team drives synergies across the franchise, fosters innovation and best practices, and creates solutions to bring speed, scale and shareability to our planning processes. As we endeavour, we are seeking a dynamic talent for the role of    Analyst - Forecasting and Analytics           We are looking for a team member to support our analytics team based out of US. Robust analytics is a priority for our businesses, as the product potential has major implications to a wide range of disciplines.          It is essential to have someone who understands and aspires to implement innovative analytics techniques to drive our insights generation across different franchises.               People:     Maintain effective relationship with the end stakeholders within the allocated GBU and tasks - with an end objective to develop education and communication content as per requirement     Actively lead and develop SGH operations associates and ensure new technologies are leveraged     Initiate the contracting process and related documents within defined timelines; and     Collaborate with global stakeholders for project planning and setting up the timelines and maintaining budget.             Performance:     Refresh Existing Reports and identifies improvement opportunities in reporting and BI tools and as needed structure / functionality with the latest insights as they become available     Create dashboards to synthesize and visualize key information and enable business decisions     Works to develop deal tracking analytics and reporting capabilities     Collaborates with Digital to enhance data access across various sources, develop tools, technology, and process to constantly improve quality and productivity     Create robust forecast models taking into consideration key data, insights, trends, and assumptions around patient flow, market dynamics, competitive landscape, payer mix, supply chain inventory fluctuation, etc     Evaluate and determine the optimal method(s) for forecasting, considering the context of the forecast, availability of data, the degree of accuracy required for the process/decision-making, and the timeline available     Assess existing forecast models, identify, and prioritize areas for improvement to iteratively improve function over time     Refresh forecast model assumptions and as needed structure / functionality with the latest insights as they become available     Conduct sensitivity analyses and evaluate alternative scenarios to assist in opportunity identification and risk management     Coordinate with Insight team assisting commercial /brand team leadership in key activities, such as brand planning, performance reviews, new indication launches, and assessment of new initiatives     Coordinate with Insights team to develop and measure KPIs associated with brand strategy and tactics     Ensure objectivity of brand/therapeutic area forecasts of internal and external opportunities through establishing objectives aligned around forecast accuracy     Develop a deep understanding of internal customers data and analytical needs focusing on the customer-facing model     Access appropriate information via a variety of tools and sources     Summarize and present findings through various communication channels.             Process:     Support delivery of projects in terms of resourcing, coordination, quality, timeliness, efficiency, and high technical standards for deliveries made by the medical writing group, including scientific documents and clinical/medical reports     Contribute to overall quality enhancement by ensuring high scientific standards for the output produced by the medical writing group; and     Secure adherence to compliance procedures and internal/operational risk controls in accordance with all applicable standards     Refresh report on frequency/cycle basisweekly / monthly / quarterly / annually) ,  along with QC checks for each refresh     Use latest tools / technologies / methodologies and partner with internal teams to provide support on all sort of regular and adhoc business analytics activities like build, maintenance, and enhancements of such systems     Ability to work cross-functionally, gather requirements, analyse data, and generate insights and reports that can be used by the GBU.             Stakeholder:     Work closely with global teams and/ external vendors to ensure the end-to-end effective project delivery of the designated publication/medical education deliverables also to prioritize work and deliver on time-sensitive requests     Be able to provide and defend gathered intelligence, methodology, content, and conclusions to the global leadership in a clear, concise format.               About you             Experience   :    2+ years of experience in pharmaceutical product commercial forecasting and analytics. In-depth knowledge of common databases like IQVIA, APLD, Engagement and execution data, etc 2     + years of experience in pharmaceutical product forecasting and analytics. column2: At our Sanofi we are leveraging analytics and technology, on behalf of patients around the world. We are seeking those who have a passion for using data, analytics, and insights to drive decision making that will allow us to tackle some of the world s greatest health threats.      Within our commercial Insights, Analytics, and Data organization we are transforming to better power decision-making across our end-to-end commercialization process, from business development to late lifecycle management.      Deliverables support planning and decision making across multiple functional areas such as finance, manufacturing, product development and commercial.      In addition to ensuring high-quality deliverables, our team drives synergies across the franchise, fosters innovation and best practices, and creates solutions to bring speed, scale and shareability to our planning processes. As we endeavour, we are seeking a dynamic talent for the role of Analyst - Market Research      We are looking for a team member to support our analytics team based out of US. Robust analytics is a priority for our businesses, as the product potential has major implications to a wide range of disciplines.      It is essential to have someone who understands and aspires to implement innovative analytics techniques to drive our insights generation across different franchises.      This role is responsible for executing Immunology global market research projects and managing a consistent, timely market research process across global products. This includes finalizing questionnaires, developing recruiting lists, aggregating data, interpreting results, cross-referencing secondary sources, and reporting findings      The role requires a close partnership with market researchers based in the US and EU, as well as external agencies that manage panels and collect data on our behalf. column2: Skill required:Business Reporting & Governance - Reporting Analytics  Designation:Analyst  Qualifications:BCom  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years  What would you do? The Business Reporting and Governance vertical helps to deploy and deliver robust tracking mechanism for SLA/KPI or any other operations on a day-to-day basis. The Governance team will be responsible for contractual compliance of various aspects of contract like Governance, Reporting, Incident Management, Change Management and Survey Management along with driving automation and analytics. Assessing, managing, using, improving, monitoring, maintaining, and protecting organizational information through a system of decision rights and accountabilities for information related processes, executed according to agreed-upon models which describe who can take what actions, with what information, when, under what circumstances and using what methods. This includes focusing on tracking business performance through trusted data and insights while actively managing employee behaviors.  What are we looking for? Effective communication and organization skills with Polished, professional presence  Experience in working on automation projects  Demonstrate ability to achieve customer satisfaction through a managed service framework.  Facilitation skills and Virtual teaming experience  Adaptability to change.  Effective collaboration skills and experience  Adept in working across a heavily matrixed organization.  Proficient in MS Office with advance knowledge in excel formulas.  Ability to simplify and automate manual intensive processes using basic VBA, MS Access  Expertise in creating reports, and exposure to using PowerBI Roles and Responsibilities:  Create and Publish Daily / Weekly / Monthly Reports on time with accuracy.  Deliver ad hoc reports.  Find trends in data to spot any anomaly / provide data insights to the stake holders.  Automate reports to reduce manual efforts.

column2: A Reporting Analyst provides high quality, actionable insight to a diverse range of stakeholders, enabling them to make better, more timely decisions resulting in improved outcomes for our organization and clients     This involves collating and organizing data from disparate sources into useful datasets via secure and efficient dataflows and developing high quality reports and visualizations to enable effective analysis and decision making     Often leading or working in small, matrix groups to design and develop new management systems, processes, and reports a reporting analyst must be highly organized, motivated, and attentive to detail     They are expected to pragmatically and sensitively contribute logic, reasoning, and lateral thinking to enable optimal solutions             Responsibilities:         Work with subject matter experts to understand business processes and the associated data.     Gather management information and reporting requirements to inform development.     Design and build high quality, accurate reports that are easy to use and understand.     Analyze data to derive new insight and assure data quality and integrity.     Present insight and analysis to a wide range of people and stakeholders.     Manage risks to assure accuracy and timeliness of data and reports.     Identify and resolve issues affecting availability or quality of data and reports.     Produce and maintain high quality process and systems documentation.     Perform routine data processing procedures [ETL].         Technical Skills:         Spreadsheets [Excel or equivalent] including tables, charts, pivot charts, data queries, and data models.     Data acquisition [extract, transform, and load using a variety of tools and techniques].     Data modelling and design.     Data and business analysis.     Data visualization [Power BI or equivalent].     Basic, low code programming and automation [MS Power Platform, or Python].     Written and verbal communication [Word, Powerpoint etc.].     SQL (joins & queries) and SQL server [SSIS] scripting.       Experience:         Gathering requirements and pre-empting customer needs and issues.     Handling, analyzing, and reporting data.     Working as part of a team or project, and without direct supervision.     Applying agile principles and techniques.     Supporting technology operations and IT service management.     Working with enterprise workflow systems [Servicenow].     Projects and project management.     Identifying and implementing technology, process, or cost improvements.
